mapper.select: SELECT YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(create_date/1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) AS year, MONTH(FROM_UNIXTIME(create_date/1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) AS month,count(*) as count from ms_article GROUP BY year,month ORDER BY year desc,month desc
mapper.insert: insert into ms_article(comment_counts, create_date, summary, title, view_counts, weight, author_id, body_id, category_id) VALUES (#{commentCounts},#{createDate},#{summary},#{title},#{viewCounts},#{weight},#{authorId},#{bodyId},#{categoryId})
insert into ms_article_body(content, content_html, article_id) VALUES (#{content},#{contentHtml},#{articleId})
mapper.update: update ms_article set body_id=#{bodyId} where id=#{id}
